Package Running

source code

Submodules [hide private]
  • FuzzManager.FTB.Running.AutoRunner: AutoRunner -- Determine the correct runner class (GDB, ASan, etc) for the given program, instantiate and return it.
  • FuzzManager.FTB.Running.GDB: GDB - Contains functions directly used by GDB for crash processing
  • FuzzManager.FTB.Running.GDBRunner: GDBRunner -- Run a target program with GDB to get crash information
  • FuzzManager.FTB.Running.PersistentApplication: PersistentApplication -- Implements a persistent application for performing multiple tests and offers an interface to perform the necessary tasks around testing such an application.
  • FuzzManager.FTB.Running.StreamCollector: StreamCollector -- Runs as a thread and reads a single output stream of a process.
